page.title: 14WHAT CAN YOU DO IN NONINGTON
page.content:
If you are under five you might go to
the playgroup, on Monday, Wednesday or Thursday mornings. There are tricycles, a big slide and you can paint , climb or play games. You have to be seven before you can start Brownies. The Brownies meet in the Village hall every Friday. Most Saturdays there is swimming at Nonington College and this will cost you 40p. At the Village hall there are teams for table tennis and badminton. When you are twelve you can join the Youth Club. The Drama Group also use the Village Hall and they usually produce a pantomime every year after Christmas.You can be any age to join the Drama Group.
